content: my first PR to Lean repos! :smiley: https://github.com/leanprover-community/leanprover-community.github.io/pull/395 - fix edit instructions for undergrad templates
Thanks! Unfortunately I think the edit instructions were already correct, and your PR makes them incorrect
could well be :smile: So to change https://leanprover-community.github.io/undergrad_todo.html, you need to edit https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/master/docs/undergrad.yaml?
anyway closing the PR - need to look more into how the template is filled with data
Dmitry S. has marked this topic as resolved.

(I see now that https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/master/docs/undergrad.yaml has module names for the parts that are already implemented, and the empty strings '' or Wikipedia URLs - for those that are not)`
Indeed; the links you suggested are the ones to change the templates; but almost no one needs to know how to do that. The pages are intended to tell the reader how to update the data.
